name: Graveyard
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The graveyard has a peaceful, solemn atmosphere with the scent of earth and the subtle fragrance of flowers left as offerings. The sound of wind through the trees and the quiet murmur of prayers creates a reverent, contemplative mood. The air carries the weight of memory and the mysteries of what lies beyond death.
